thread.title: Jeff Templeton
thread.title_full: Driver Support reviewed by Jeff Templeton

author: Jeff Templeton
title: Jeff Templeton
text: Software has repeatedly crashed on the company's end not on my end. Customer support does not exist here I have called them a dozen of times and email them a dozen of times and they never gotten back to me! Otherwise anyone going through this issue to contact the governor's office
